name: Thai Chicken Platter
ingredientLines: 1 tablespoon each sunflower oil and sesame oil
1 lemongrass stem (pale part only), finely chopped
1 long red chilli, seeds removed, finely chopped
1 tablespoon sweet chilli sauce, plus extra to serve
1 cup each chopped mint and coriander
Baby cos lettuce leaves, cucumber batons, fried wonton wrappers (optional), lime wedges and steamed rice, to serve
